name: CLN-R
description:
CLN-R (Cleaning, Launder and Nuclear Repair) is a game were you play a robot that clean, tidy and repair its way through a spaceship.

This game was a project done during the 2nd semester of a bachelors degree in "Gametechnology and Simulation" and "Animation and Digital Art" at Inland University of Applied Sciences.

GitHub repository can be found at: https://github.com/AudunBeck/CLNR
